name: STAYING UP
description:
CONTENT WARNING for elements of horror, gore and death, these elements are not really written in excessive detail though.

This game was created (very quickly) in Twine for Emerson Game Development's Twine-a-thon 2022 game jam! It's rather barebones and scuffed as I mainly used the project to learn more about Twine, but there are like ~12 possible endings!

:D
